mapper.select: SELECT serviceIdx,serviceName,serviceBirth,serviceTel, serviceIntro,serviceAddr,serviceEmail,serviceImg,serviceImgName, subject as themeName FROM serviceInfo s JOIN theme t ON s.themenum=t.themenum WHERE serviceIdx=${demander_seq}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM volun_bbs WHERE serviceIdx=#{demander_seq}
SELECT volunIdx, subject, content, startDay, endDay, startTime, endTime, place, progress, volunteer_type, volunDays, themeNum FROM volun_bbs WHERE serviceIdx=#{demander_seq}
SELECT table_name as clubApplyTable FROM tabs WHERE (INSTR(table_name, 'CLUB_APPLY_', 1, 1)>0) AND (INSTR(table_name, 'CLUB_APPLY_M', 1, 1)<1)
SELECT COUNT(clubApplyIdx) FROM ${clubApplyTable} WHERE volunIdx=#{volunIdx} AND enabled=0
SELECT clubName, clubApplyIdx, ca.clubIdx, volunIdx, enabled FROM ${clubApplyTable} ca JOIN clubinfo ci ON ca.clubIdx=ci.clubIdx WHERE volunIdx=#{volunIdx} AND enabled=0

SELECT DISTINCT(cam.userIdx), userName, userBirth, userAddr, userGender, userTel, userEmail, userJob FROM club_Apply_${clubIdx} ca JOIN club_Apply_memlist_${clubIdx} cam ON ca.clubApplyIdx=cam.clubApplyIdx JOIN memberinfo mi ON cam.userIdx=mi.userIdx WHERE ca.volunIdx=#{volunIdx}
SELECT clubIdx, clubName, clubBirth, clubAddr, userId, introduce, themeNum, photoFileName as memImg FROM clubinfo WHERE clubIdx = #{clubIdx}
